resources.string: Doms countries capitals and flags - Quiz Game

ABOUT ME:

 My name is Dominik.
 I am software developer.
 I am developing various android app for fun ,learn and challenge myself purposes.
 I do not take this seriously, so instead of add lots of marketing-wise feature (which is pain in the a.. for the user),i trying to add little easter eggs .
 If you want know more,just look to my parody of homepage http://pastor.ovh.org.
 I hope, You will enjoy use my program.
 If You have any comment, suggestion,feedback.
 Feel happy to send to me.
 My email: dmspastor@gmail.com.

 Ciao.

ABOUT GAME:
 This game was created as part of 'weekend challenge'.
 See my blog about how challenge looked and how to make simple game as this one.
 Link: http://pastorcmentarny.blogspot.co.uk/2013/02/how-to-make-simple-game-in-android-part.html
 It is simple causal quiz game where user can guess countries, capitals, flag or continents .
 Idea for this game came to me during developing Doms learning chinese game , where i added few mini lesson will be about countries capitals continents and etc as i discover flags will occupy too much spaces, so i made this.. independent game.

ABOUT GAME ACCURACY:
 ** This game is NOT political correct! **
 *	 I made decisions quite randomly and they are not necessary based on my believes.
 *	 List of countries based extended version of what UN consider as country and partly ISO-3316-1 standard.
 I included for example England,Scotland and Wales.
 *	 Few countries are trans-continental as they are between 2 continents. For Egypt, Russia and Turkey both continents are consider as correct. Rest countries a signed to specific continent (That cover 95% or more).
 *	 Brunei, East Timor, Indonesia,Malaysia, Philippines, and Singapore lies on the border of Oceania and Asia.
 As there is few version about which country belong to which region, I arbitrarily make decision that all of them are asian countries.
 *	 Some capitals has * in the end,this is due some issue to related define capital of that country (for example South Africa has 3 capitals,where Nauru does not have a capital) .
 *	 Please look to country's info in Countries Info in main menu for details information about capitals of these countries.
 *	 I tried to make sure that all information are as correct as possible,but if YOU find a mistake.Let me know.I will correct them as soon as possible.
 Thank you in advance.

Woops. No information about .. about.How bizarre, is it ?

Welcome in tutorial
 GAME:
 You have 2 way to start game: NEW GAME and CUSTOM GAME
 
NEW GAME . It will starts 'ADVENTURE MODE' 'Adventure mode' in this game you need answer on question it mix all classic games modes and add extra one where you need guess region of the country. During game good and bad things will happen to you like .. add some points or health ,lost some health or gain a 'remove bad answer' which i strongly believe is self explanatory. 
 On game over ,score can be saved locally or put to global leaderboard.
 
CUSTOM GAME. First, you need select between one of 3 classic game or create custom game:
 Classic games to choose: country of the world,capitals of the world,flags of the world.
 When you choose ,then you will answer 50 question and you will receive a grade on the end.
 Perfect(100%),Awesome(99-88\%% ),Great(87-75\%% ), Good(75-63\%% ),Poor(62-51\%% ),Fail(50-0\%% ).
 CUSTOM MODE: SAPPER - When you make mistake .. then game over :).
 TIME ATTACK .You have a limited time to answer on 50 question.You lose points for too slow answer and you lose points for wrong answer.
 WALKTHORUGH . You need guess all countries.
 

Next you need select what you want ask for (Country,capital or FLAG) and what answer you want give (Country,capital or Continent). 
Press START GAME.(No all combinations are allowed).
 I hope you will enjoy your game.

 About Some capitals has stars in the end.Please looks to countries list for information about why i arbitrary chosen.
If you press BACK BUTTON one more time, then game will be abandoned and you will back to main menu.
If you press one more time.Game will be abandoned and you will back to main menu!

So.. here you can setup what you want play.
 you have 3 steps .
 1)chose type of the game:
 SAPPER - When you make mistake .. then game over :).
 TIME ATTACK - You have a limited time to answer on 50 question.You lose points for too slow answer and you lose points for wrong answer.
 WALKTHORUGH - You need guess all countries.
 

2)Next you need select what you want ask for (Country,capital or FLAG) and what answer you want give (Country,capital or Continent). 
3)Press START GAME.(No all combinations are allowed).
 
Btw. if you want play adventure mode ,go back to main menu and press new game->adventure.
 (adventure mode offers random question and has some events to make game more excited) I hope you will enjoy game.
Unknown choice from Dialog.Bug?Abnormal behave ?User select:
Something went wrong with appbrain init method.
Swarm? Don\'t panic. Swarm provides access to global high score.If you don\'t want use global high score.Simply press back button and start a game.

Adventure mode.
 Let's skip bla-bla and move to rules. Rules:
 You need select correct answer from 4 or 6 possible answers.
 Score system is so confusing that even i don' really remember,how it works.
 Here are some rules:
 *You gain 1hp every level.
 *You lose hp,if you give incorrect answer or you are too slow.
 *More often you make mistake more hp will lose!

 
Random events:
 *Heal - add health
 *Jackpot - add lots of points,health and move to next level
 *MinorPointsBonus = add minor points
 *Poison - you lose some health
 *addRemoveWrongAnswer - add some amount of 'remove wrong answer'
 *painKiller - reduce penalty amount cause by incorrect answer
 *blind - buttons are invisible.test your luck :)
 *freeze - you need press 'Tap to unfreeze' few times (up to 51 times) to unfreeze buttons.
 *50 percent chance - you will be have 2 buttons available with correct answer and ONe with incorrect answer.
